channel.title: Edit on data table has no effect on pivot table
channel.description:
Hi everyone!
I changed a dataformat of my string column "issue_link" to "Display as: Link" (through "Edit Visualization" on "Table"). While the change affects the table itself (the data in "issue_link" are now indeed links that I click on), If I drag "issue_link" in my pivot table, it keeps its original format, namely "string". I cannot click on the links anymore in the pivot table.
Is this a desired behaviour or am I missing something out?
Best regards! (Redash Version 10.1)

item.title: Edit on data table has no effect on pivot table
item.dc:creator: Schmabudi
item.description:
Okay, I see. Thank you very much for your answer, jesse.

Read full topic
item.source: Edit on data table has no effect on pivot table

item.title: Edit on data table has no effect on pivot table
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Thanks for your question. The Link settings applies to the table visualization only. Pivot tables are a different visualisation type which does not support links.

Read full topic
item.source: Edit on data table has no effect on pivot table
